dublin_core.dcvalue: This video entitled What is mPossible attempts to address a number of concerns commonly held about the feasibility of deploying mHealth solutions in low resource settings Activities and interviews of Frontline Health Research Workers of the JiVitA Project in Bangladesh www jivita org are featured a close collaboration between Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health www jhsph edu mPower Social Enterprises www mpower social com and the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare of the Government of Bangladesh www dghs gov bd Why it helps with planning Demonstrates the value of working with your end users when introducing new technology Covers implementation considerations challenges and advantages when equiping community health workers with mobile phones in Bangladesh

Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-10T10:39:11Z (GMT).
